version_description:
We have fixed some minor bugs which can be reported to support@weatherpro.eu.

Feel free to email us in case you experience any problems, and please rate our app in the App Store if you like WeatherPro Free. We thank you for your feedback!

We have fixed some minor bugs which can be reported to support@weatherpro.eu.

Feel free to email us in case you experience any problems, and please rate our app in the App Store if you like WeatherPro Free. We thank you for your feedback!

• To enhance the usability we have restructured the app settings and the menu in the upper left corner of the weather overview. This will simplify the navigation by giving easy access to main features such as the search function, weather news, webcams etc.
• In the restructured menu users also have a direct connection to our help center via the new help button.
• We have also fixed some minor bugs which can be reported via our help center (accessible via the help button in the restructured menu within the weather overview).

Feel free to email us in case you experience any problems, and please rate our app in the App Store. We thank you for your feedback!

• Users can now see data from their Netatmo wind gauge.
• To provide a better overview we improved the rain gauge design.
• Users can now give us in-app feedback on our forecasts for each location right in the weather overview.
• We have also fixed minor bugs which were reported via our help center (accessible via the help button).

Feel free to email us in case you experience any problems, and please rate our app in the App Store. We thank you for your feedback!

• We have improved our app usability, and hope you guys like the changes!
• You can now easily submit support requests via the new contact button (accessible via the menu in the upper left corner of the weather overview).

We hope you enjoy using WeatherPro Free and we thank you for any feedback!

• Right on time for the Apple release, the app now supports iOS 10 and its most important features!
• Additionally, we improved the design of the widget for iOS 10, which you can now also quickly access with 3D Touch directly from the app icon.

We hope you enjoy using WeatherPro Free and we thank you for any feedback!

We are excited to deliver a long-awaited update to the WeatherPro iOS app.

This release focuses on:
· Rebuilding compatibility up to the latest iOS14.5.
· Resolving a number of bugs and crashes, including deprecating unsupported features.
